code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Probe
    participant Aggregation as Aggregation Engine
    participant TSA as Third-party TSA
    participant API as FastAPI
    participant DB as Database
    participant Client

    %% Data collection
    Probe->>Aggregation: Send standardized scan result
    Aggregation->>Aggregation: Validate & normalize scan data

    %% Timestamp acquisition
    Aggregation->>TSA: Request timestamp (Education_StudentDB)
    TSA-->>Aggregation: Return TimeStampToken (Education_GradeSync)

    %% Store scan + token
    Aggregation->>API: HTTP POST scan data + TST
    API->>DB: Store scan data + TST
    DB-->>API: Confirmation stored

    %% Offline token verification
    Client->>API: Request token verification (Education_LMS_Portal)
    API->>DB: Retrieve scan data + TST
    DB-->>API: Return scan + TST
    API->>API: Verify token signature offline using TSA certificate
    API-->>Client: Return validity result (Education_ClassroomService)

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Education_StudentDB 和 Education_GradeSync 这一块。
不，其实叫 Education_StudentDB处理 会更准确一点。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Education_StudentDB处理'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_ClassroomService 的环节。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_ClassroomService'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
